attributes.action: Stockport adult social care to accept PDD NOS PDA PDD and all ASC spectrum conditions on its criteria not just Autism as it currently dose
attributes.additional_details: well we need to to this as people in stockport with ASC conditions are not being supported in our community so much so that are residents have made are own group but we need our social care team to understand that autism is a spectrum not just one condition and people on the spectrum have different needs and they need to support people with ASC needs
